titleStmt.title: Gods house, with the nature, and use thereof, as it ought to be understood and respected by Christians under the Gospel. / By Simon Gunton M. of Art.
titleStmt.author: Gunton, Simon, 1609-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Dring, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the George in Fleet-street, near Cliffords-Inne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
